oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original Civil War hardtack
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pvt. Thomas Benjamin Fisher, Co. G, 11th Ill. Inf., USA, transferred Co. I, 46th Ill. Inf., USA carried this hardtack home at the end of the war. [Article about Pvt. Fisher by donor: Two Amboy Sons Go to War, Illinois State Genealogical Society Quarterly, Vol. 28, No. 1, Spring 1996]
